name: Ducky Dungeon
description:
This is my submission for the Blackthornprod game jam! 

The theme was "Less is More" and Ducky Dungeon follows that theme in a creative way! Our unlikely hero, Bernard the Snail, has anatidaephobia (fear of ducks)! When there are more duckies on the screen, Bernard has less courage, making him more difficult to move! Please help Bernard in journey through the Ducky Dungeon!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Aim using mouse and left click to shoot

Esc - Pause
